body.head: NEE023355
body.p: Once there was a girl who went with her younger brother into the jungle. They met a tiger which attacked the girl. She died. Her younger brother was very frightened. He ran away and climbed a tall tree. The tiger brought the girl to his own world. Here she became alive again.

The brother was frightened to come down. He sat in the tree eating durian. Finally he climbed down and went to his parents. "A tiger has attacked my sister," he told them. In the evening they conducted a nöpoh. They were in the jungle so they did the nöpoh there, not in the house. But they could not achieve anything. The next day they went to Bongso's house. He was eating cold rice. In the evening Bongso made a nöpoh. He went to the land of the tiger. The tiger was asleep, but the girl was awake. "Come quickly," Bongso told her. "No, I am frightened," said she. Bongso lifted her up and brought her back to his house where the others were still conducting the nöpoh.
